Uses of Interface
uniol.apt.util.interrupt.Interrupter

  • Packages that use Interrupter 
    Package Description
    uniol.apt.util.interrupt  

    • Uses of Interrupter in uniol.apt.util.interrupt

      Classes in uniol.apt.util.interrupt that implement Interrupter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChainedInterrupter
      Interrupter that checks if any out of a given list of interrupters triggered.
      class  NoOpInterrupter
      Interrupter that never interrupts modules.
      class  ThreadStatusInterrupter
      Interrupter that checks Thread.isInterrupted() to determine if a module should be interrupted.
      class  TimeoutInterrupter
      Interrupter that takes a timestamp when created and uses that to implement a timeout.
      Methods in uniol.apt.util.interrupt that return Interrupter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Interrupter InterrupterRegistry.getCurrentThreadInterrupter()
      Returns the interrupter for the currently executing (calling) thread.
      Methods in uniol.apt.util.interrupt with parameters of type Interrupter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void InterrupterRegistry.setCurrentThreadInterrupter(Interrupter interrupter)
      Set the interrupter for the currently executing (calling) thread.
      Constructors in uniol.apt.util.interrupt with parameters of type Interrupter 
      Constructor and Description
      ChainedInterrupter(Interrupter... interrupters)
      Create a new instance of this class checking the given interrupters.
